title: Second sem class shuffle
content: In second sem will the classes be shuffled exactly according to SRN only? Is it possible to predict our classmates if their SRNs are close to ours or is there some other parameter that is used?

comments.body: There is no shuffling of classes in second sem. Only after 1st year they shuffle once and remain that way until you graduate
Yea but for our batch the kcet students joined 2-3 months late due to some issues. Hence they've been in a separate fast paced batch for the entire sem. And they're gonna be merged now.
won't matter lol. they'll be in a separate class, but study alongside us.
I heard from a senior that they shuffle
They did shuffle second sem last year, but not much, mostly to segregate branches.
Yes, but even they gave the ESAs with you right? Coming next semester they'll be in their class only and start the semester with you
Yeah looks like some new thing nowadays
